660800.name: Blossoming Yandere 満開 ヤンデレ
660800.description:
"I'd finally moved out of my parents place. I'd purchased an apartment online without telling them, and left while they were away. I was looking forward to living all by myself, but then I noticed her. She slept in the garbage outside my window, and I just couldn't ignore it. So I invited her in, my new roommate, Miki is her name."

Blossoming Yandere has you playing as Kizuki, a young man who's moved into his first apartment. As he settled into his new home, he spotted a girl named Miki sleeping in the garbage outside. Having always wanted to be someone's hero, he invited her to move in with him. She's a bit weird, obsessive maybe, but honestly he liked her company, treasured having her around. But awakening one night, he realized she was gone.

And thus properly begun the tale of poor Kizuki and the Blossoming Yandere.

Features:

  • Yandere horror is rare, and full of untapped potential. I hope this spin on the strikes with you. 

  • Be the person of affection to a rather unique yandere girl who you found in your garbage.

  • Your actions and words play into your fate.

  • Full of twists and turns.

  • Explore an apartment complex as you slowly put together a greater mystery.

  • Strange sound design is crafted to allure you to immerse yourself into an odd atmosphere.

  • A few different endings.

Do you ever think how cruel it is to tear off a flowers' petals...?
660800.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
